headlines.description: AC Milan scored twice in the last quarter of an hour to sink AS Roma 2-0 in a slow-paced Serie A match on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milan sink Roma with late goals in hot match

headlines.description: Sixth-placed Napoli claimed their fifth consecutive Serie A victory when they easily beat relegation-threatened visitors SPAL 3-1 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Napoli claim fifth win in a row by beating SPAL

headlines.description: Bologna pushed Sampdoria deeper into Serie A trouble on Sunday as they handed Claudio Ranieri's side a third 2-1 defeat in eight days.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bologna push Sampdoria into deeper trouble

headlines.description: Substitute Luis Muriel rifled in two long-range goals as irrepressible Atalanta beat Udinese 3-2 away on Sunday for their third straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Muriel long-range shots give Atalanta another win

headlines.description: Third-placed Inter Milan scored twice in the last six minutes through Stefan De Vrij and Alessandro Bastoni to snatch a 2-1 win at Parma.
headlines.shortLinkText: Inter stage late fightback to stun Parma
